column4: how do I find g++ which i think I installed from the Ubuntu dvd
It can be found in the repos. If you run it in the command line, you'll be able to tell if it's installed or not.
g++ on its own is just used from the terminal (Applications->Accessories->Terminal). Example g++ <source_filename> will compile single source files.
Oh yeah, there are more powerful ones, but gedit is fine.
